name: Biomiméticoin
description:
Global Game Jam 2022 – Theme: Duality

In a universe where the Technology and Nature's symbioses generate a desperate race for resources, where your signs are playable characters in a search for coins. Biomiméticoin is a game made for Mega drive, playing with the idea of collecting or extracting resources in a breath-taking race! I mean, to burn the circuits!

Needs either a Sega Genesis/Mega Drive emulator or actual hardware to run. 2-players only.

This project was developed for the Global Game Jam 2022 – Baixada Santista (UNISANTOS).

Credits
  • Programming by Danilo
  • Game Design by Mitzrael
  • Art by Thaynara
Special Thanks
